abstract: Driven column review of Toyota's 2016 Scion iM.
lead_paragraph: Europeans have been more willing to embrace the hatchback style, but the iM’s ample room and alert driving feel could change some minds in America.

headline.main: Video Review: The Scion iM Is Proud to Be a Hatchback
headline.print_headline: Scion’s iM: A Toyota Matrix Sequel Under Another Name

snippet: Europeans have been more willing to embrace the hatchback style, but the iM’s ample room and alert driving feel could change some minds in America.

keywords.value: Scion Division of Toyota Motor Corp
